page.title: 05Quarrying in & near Well
page.content: Steetley Ltd. decided to pull out of the quarry when permission to expand was refused after vigorous protests from Well villagers about 5 years ago. The supply of dolomitic limestone, road stone and agricultural lime has now finished;the ready mix concrete business closes at the end of the year.No jobs have been lost.The area has been landscaped and will be returned to agricultural use,1 large shed to be left for the farmer. A huge area of land around Nosterfield is now a gravel quarry. The locals ae concerned as the land is not being reinstated to its previous standards and there is a large volume of heavy traffic.Villagers have opposed derestriction on B6267 for 21 years.On 21-AUG-85 a 30 min. survey showed a total of 47 vehicles,mainly heavy commercial,passing thru' village
